alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 2:01PM MST until February 28 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow increasing Monday night into Tuesday morning. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 to 8 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will lead to blowing snow and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Park Range, including Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will become slippery in spots, especially through mountain passes. Use caution when traveling. Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
